attributes.action: Stop exorbitant amounts of money being spent on silly things when there is a recession on!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is in a major recession, yet we are managing to spend  2 million pound on creating a statue of a horse for the south, £220,000 spent on prisoners for them to play playstation and xbox computer games,BBC spend £21million of taxpayers' money on Gaelic TV channel,  shouldn't this money be put to better use?? Please sign this petition hopefully the Prime minister will take notice of this and start putting the taxpayers money to better use and get the uk out of the recession and back on top.
